backend/main.mo: Entry point for the Motoko backend actor that composes blob storage functionality via the MixinStorage mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two fullscreen-related features (toggle button and header/footer hiding) to their implementing files and associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, covering styles, config, pages, components, hooks, and game implementations.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes including background, foreground, primary, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React app with a root div and a module script entry point targeting src/main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component that sets up TanStack Router with home and game-play routes, provides a FullscreenContext, and conditionally hides Header/Footer when fullscreen is active.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying the Arcade Hub logo, a list of all 11 game titles, copyright year, and a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/GameCard.tsx: Reusable game card component rendering a thumbnail, genre badge, title, description, and Play Now button with four neon accent color variants and hover animations.
frontend/src/components/GameLibrary.tsx: Game library section that defines metadata for all 11 games and renders them in a responsive grid of GameCard components with neon arcade styling.
frontend/src/components/games/ArenaBlitz: Canvas-based top-down arena shooter where the player moves with WASD and aims with the mouse to fight waves of chaser, shooter, and bouncer enemies across escalating rounds.
frontend/src/components/games/AsteroidsG: Canvas clone of Asteroids with wrapping movement, multi-size asteroid splitting, bullet firing, lives, score, and wave progression rendered in a neon retro style.
frontend/src/components/games/BreakoutGa: Canvas Breakout game featuring a multi-row colored brick grid with varying HP, paddle control via keyboard, ball physics, lives, and score display.
frontend/src/components/games/CyberStrik: Canvas vertical shoot-em-up where the player's ship moves horizontally and fires upward at waves of basic, fast, and tank enemies with particle explosion effects.
frontend/src/components/games/FlappyBird: Canvas Flappy Bird clone with gravity, tap/click flap input, scrolling pipe obstacles, score tracking with high score, and a neon cyberpunk visual style.
frontend/src/components/games/GridWarsGa: A turn-based tactical grid game where the player commands soldiers, tanks, and snipers on an 8x8 board against an AI enemy, with move/attack phases and win/loss detection.
frontend/src/components/games/MemoryGame: A card-matching memory game with 8 symbol pairs, tracking moves, matched pairs, and elapsed time, with neon-styled flip animations and a restart option.
frontend/src/components/games/NeonKickGa: A canvas-based 2D neon soccer game where the player controls a character against an AI opponent, with goal detection, score tracking, and a win condition at 5 goals.
frontend/src/components/games/NeonRacers: A canvas-based top-down lane-racing game where the player dodges AI cars across 5 lanes over a set distance, tracking speed, score, and overtakes.
frontend/src/components/games/PixelVoyag: A Flappy Bird-style canvas game where the player taps/presses to fly a bird through scrolling neon pipes, with particle effects, score tracking, and a high score.
frontend/src/components/games/Platformer: A side-scrolling 2D platformer game rendered on an HTML canvas with a player that can jump, collect coins, avoid enemies, and reach a goal flag across a multi-platform level with camera scrolling.
frontend/src/components/games/PongGame.t: A two-player Pong game rendered on an HTML canvas where Player 1 uses W/S keys and Player 2 uses arrow keys, with ball speed increasing on paddle hits and a first-to-7 win condition.
frontend/src/components/games/PrismJumpG: An endless tunnel-runner game where a gravity-affected ball must navigate through procedurally generated colored tunnel segments by jumping, collecting gems for bonus points.
frontend/src/components/games/RuneQuestG: A top-down arena shooter where the player casts colored rune projectiles using the mouse to defeat waves of enemies (goblins, orcs, mages) across escalating levels while managing health and mana.
frontend/src/components/games/ShadowRunG: An endless side-scrolling runner game where the player jumps or ducks to avoid low and high obstacles on a neon-grid background, with increasing speed over time.
Implements a classic Snake game on an HTML5 canvas with neon visuals, tracking score and game-over state via React hooks and a ref-based game loop.
frontend/src/components/games/SpaceInvad: Implements a Space Invaders clone on an HTML5 canvas with animated aliens, player bullets, lives, waves, and a neon retro visual style.
frontend/src/components/games/StellarAss: A rhythm-based space shooter where the player dodges asteroids, lasers, and mines that spawn on beats, featuring particles, combos, and a scrolling star background.
frontend/src/components/games/TetrisGame: Implements a Tetris game on an HTML5 canvas with standard tetrominoes, line clearing, level progression, score tracking, and a next-piece preview canvas.
frontend/src/components/games/VoxelRealm: A tower-defense game rendered on an HTML5 canvas where players place towers and walls on a grid to stop waves of enemies following a fixed path, with gold, lives, and wave progression.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header for Arcade Hub with a logo, Home link, a smooth-scroll Games button, and a badge showing the total game count.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication via DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions and status flags. Includes an InternetIdentityProvider component that persists identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file with no active code, reserved for future backend query integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Google Fonts and Tailwind, defining CSS custom properties for a dark neon-themed design system with oklch colors, neon glow utilities, and scanline effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/GamePlayPage.tsx: Page component that lazily loads and renders one of 11 game components based on the route's gameId param, with a toolbar providing back navigation and a fullscreen toggle button synced to the Fullscreen API.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page featuring a hero section with logo, neon-styled title, CTA buttons, and a stats display, followed by a GameLibrary component for browsing available games.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the theme with oklch-based neon color tokens, arcade/orbitron/rajdhani font families, neon box-shadow utilities, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking implemented features (fullscreen toggle, hide header/footer in fullscreen) and a pending request to display games in fullscreen mode for the Arcade Hub multi-game project.
